Needs_Art

Rank 3 - I'd feel more comfortable if the fortification side was sorcery speed

Attached permanent has “T: If this permanent is a creature, each opponent loses 1 life. Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. If this permanent is a land, you gain 1 life. When you do, if this was activated during your main phase, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.”
Equip 2B
Fortify 3G

If this artifact is attached to a creature, that creature has “T: Target opponent loses 1 life. Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.”
If this artifact is attached to a land, that land has “T: You gain 1 life. Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.”
Equip 2B
Fortify 3G
